title: 820-3209 Macbook air no green light
message:
HI! I have this macbook air there is no have green light.. i found some corruption on the resistors R7721, R7720 and the cap C7723.. i replaced this 3 but i haven't green light. No water damage in any other side.. looking for power rails i see PP5V_S5 Is missing, and i replace the U7201 Looking for a solution but i have nothing. so, how i can know when the PM_SLP_S4_L is Missing? how to measure this?  i do check the resistance at the R7251 and R7252 and i have 00.2 ohms.. but i dont know how to measure the enable signals.

My measures


PPBUS_G3H : @ R5301 8.16v
PPVIN_SW_T29BST  :  @ C3890 0v
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS : @ C7556 8,16v
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER_ISNS : @ Pin 23 U7201 8,16v
PP3V42_G3H : @ Pin 12 U7000 3,40v
PPVRTC_G3H : @ Pin 1 U2700 3,40v
PP5V_S5 : @ 0,00v
PP3V_S5 : @ 0,01v

Plz, whats should i do?

title: 820-3209 Macbook air no green light
message: PPBUS is too low, SMC is not running. SMC_RESET high? If yes then probably crap under SMC or dead SMC.
